pkgmetadata.longdescription: py-import-cycles================Detect import cycles in Python projectsInstallation------------The py-import-cycles package is available on PyPI: `python3 -m pip install --user py-import-cycles`Usage-----* `python3 -m py_import_cycles --version`* `python3 -m py_import_cycles --help`* `python3 -m py_import_cycles --project-path /path/to/project`
